props.infoText: The Venture Securities, Inc. team is on hand to provide expert services to help fulfill your investment requirements. Launch the online application form so we can get more information about you and your objectives.

data.title: Who we are
data.desc:
Venture Securities, Inc. is a leading full service securities brokerage registered with the Philippines Securities and Exchange Commission and a member of the Philippine Stock Exchange. It was established for the primary purpose of selling and dealing of Philippine equity securities.

The company services a broad range of clients, from small individual investors, to government institutions, trust funds and corporate accounts. Our goal is to provide all our clients with timely execution at the best possible prices backed-up by efficient and reliable settlement of trades.

data.title: Our Services
data.desc:
Personalized, Broker-Assisted Trading. We provide personalized service to our clients with our experienced and highly skilled Certified Securities Representatives who will guide and assist them, give timely advice and promptly execute their trades.

Competitive Commission Rates.
We offer very competitive rates in the market.

data.title: Vision
data.desc: To be the most preferred stock brokerage firm in the country

data.title: Mission
data.desc:
We aim to provide unparalleled service to our investor clients.
We achieve these goals by providing knowledge and prudent advice to our clients while aiming to execute their trades at the best possible market price.
We strive to help our clients achieve their short-term and/or long-term investment goals of growth, capital appreciation and/or capital preservation.
We will maintain the highest level of integrity in dealing with our clients and fellow brokers.

questions.question: How do I open an account?
questions.answer: Select whether you want to open an Individual/Joint Account or Corporate Account.

questions.question: What if I am not a Filipino Citizen or Filipino Resident?
questions.answer: You can still open an account provided you have a Social Security Number (SSS), Taxpayer's Identification Number (TIN), Passport Number and Alien Certificate of Registration/Business Certificate/Work Permit (if Resident Foreigner)

questions.question: Can there be more then two (2) people in a joint account?
questions.answer: Yes, you can have a joint account with your significant other or group of friends but subject for approval. Call us at our telephone number (632) 8848-6505 to inform your wish to have more than two (2) people in the joint account.

questions.question: How will I know if the account is ready for trading
questions.answer: We will notify you through telephone regarding the approval of your application.

questions.question: How do I fund my account?
questions.answer:
You can make deposit to any account of Venture Securities, Inc. listed below
Banco de Oro (BDO) 360 800 9180

Union Bank (UBP) 00 001 011731 3

RCBC 0000 5109 39
*Note
It is vital that you send us a copy of your deposit slip and/or remittance instructions indicating your name through our fax number 8848-6505 or emailing to info@venturesec.com. The speed at which your funds will be credited to your account will depend on the exact deposit method that you use.

questions.question: I have a stock certificer, how will i be able to sell them?
questions.answer: Stock certificates can be lodged or deposited into your account as long as the name appearing on the stock certificate is the same with your Venture account name. You may submit the duly endorsed stock certificates to our office located at 8/F STI Holdings Center, 6764 Ayala Avenue, Makati City. The certificates will then be submitted to the Transfer Agent for clearing then passed on to the Philippine Depository & Trust Corp (PDTC) for custody, which can take between a week to several weeks depending on the speed of the clearing process of these two organizations and if there are no discrepancies with the requirements. The Transfer Agent may also request for original signature cards and IDs to be submitted for verification purposes (signature cards are available from Venture Securities, Inc.).

questions.question: 7. How do I convert my shares to certificates?
questions.answer:
We will notify you through telephone regarding the approval of your application.
The process is called Upliftment. The request for conversion of shares to certificates shall follow the following procedures:

a. Fill up a Request for Upliftment form. Secure and fill out a Specimen Signature Card from VSI’s office. Submit the accomplished and signed Request for Upliftment Form and Signature Card together with copies of your latest valid IDs.

b. Pay the appropriate Upliftment Fee. Occasionally, the Stock Transfer Agent may require you to personally appear in their office. VSI will notify you once required.

c. Processing may take one (1) to three (3) months depending on the Stock Transfer Agent. VSI will notify you once the Stock Certificates are available for release.
